name: Fix tabbar with TabMixPlus and Firefox 2 reloaded
description:
Installed:  "TabMixPlus" and "Firefox 2 theme for Firefox 3"
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/6898
http://tmp.garyr.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=9178

The tabs in single and double row look kind of wonky.  This style points out what is wrong with the theme, while also making them square which is my personal taste.
